mapper.select: select idmultiplayergameresult, fumen_code, fumen_string, idmultiplayergame from multiplayergamefumen where idmultiplayergameresult = #{idmultiplayergameresult}
mapper.insert: insert into multiplayergamefumen(fumen_code, fumen_string, idmultiplayergame) values (#{fumenCode}, #{fumenString}, #{idmultiplayergame})

insert into multiplayergamefumen(fumen_code, fumen_string, idmultiplayergame) values
(#{entity.fumenCode}, #{entity.fumenString}, #{entity.idmultiplayergame})

insert into multiplayergamefumen(fumen_code, fumen_string, idmultiplayergame) values
(#{entity.fumenCode}, #{entity.fumenString}, #{entity.idmultiplayergame})
on duplicate key update fumen_code = values(fumen_code), fumen_string = values(fumen_string), idmultiplayergame = values(idmultiplayergame)
mapper.update:
update multiplayergamefumen
fumen_code = #{fumenCode},
fumen_string = #{fumenString},
idmultiplayergame = #{idmultiplayergame},
where idmultiplayergameresult = #{idmultiplayergameresult}
